KitKat::

She listened to the discusion.  "I have a recommendation Commander. 
Why not try to attack from several differnt vantage points? First, 
let the spy think we will take out thier bases main power supply, 
there by misleading them for surely the spy will tell them of our 
plan. Then, we send another in to take a hostage. Not the one closest 
one to thier leader, but the one with most knowlage of thier base and 
weapons and tactics. Then we reprogram that bot to our side. In the 
mean time, we attack from the front and side with a main assault. We 
do what damage we can to thier base and leave. With the hostage 
converted to our side we can find another way to create more damage 
to them and possable bring them down for good. this is my humble 
opinion Commander Hydras."
